items.sentence: Tom, Mary, John and Alice all should go with you.
Tom would be interested in hearing that, I think.
Tom won't stop until he gets everything he wants.
Tom told Mary he wasn't interested in doing that.
From the bottom of my heart, I want to thank you.
Your project needs a significant amount of money.
My sunglasses were stolen at the beach yesterday.
My friend sent me a letter to find out how I was.
My mother's mother is my only living grandparent.
I don't really feel like playing chess right now.
